definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: His wife died a year inside.
Summer slowly faded, and Grandpa died before it was time to bring in the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 夏曰逐步磨滅，爺爺在豐收前就棄世了。
我們總有一天要棄世而去。

sentences.english: His wife died a year prior.
His wife died a year gone.
He wants to give up the world and take the vow of poverty and chastity, as I did.
sentences.chinese: 他想棄世並宣誓安貧守貞，就像我一樣。
